title: Event Step Configuration
description: Event-driven step that processes behavioral triggers and initiates targeted email campaigns based on user behavior patterns.

title: Campaign Condition Evaluation
description: Evaluates behavioral campaigns against user conditions including engagement scores, purchase history, and cart values.

title: Campaign Cooldown Management
description: Implements cooldown periods to prevent spam and ensures users don't receive the same campaign too frequently.

title: Behavioral Sequence Initiation
description: Creates behavioral email sequences with appropriate delays and personalized content based on trigger type and user data.

title: Behavioral Content Generation
description: Generates personalized email content for different behavioral triggers (cart abandonment, inactivity, high engagement, purchase ready).

title: Campaign Trigger Tracking
description: Tracks behavioral campaign triggers with comprehensive logging and event emission for analytics and monitoring.
